short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TravelArrow is your virtual travel agent that sits in the browser. We help you unlock deals to save big on your next vacation!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As your all-in-one travel agent, Travel Arrow finds you hidden deals and savings on all your favorite travel sites!

Some of our incredible features include:

üßë‚Äçüíª COMPLIMENTARY TRAVEL AGENT SERVICE

After installing the chrome extension, Travel Arrow will serve as your travel agency and offer travel concierge via our 24/7 hotline. Our virtual assistants can help you plan trips, book hotels and activities, and help navigate issues like delays and cancellations.

‚úàÔ∏è GOOGLE FLIGHTS ENHANCEMENTS

Travel aggregators like Kayak and Skyscanner often have the cheapest flight deals. In just one click, TravelArrow converts your exact route on Google Flights to Kayak and Skyscanner. So you can find the cheapest fare without wasting time inputting your search on different sites. 

TravelArrow also enhances your Google Flights experience by adding the aircraft model and legroom as a column on the search results. Our enhancement suite makes finding the most comfortable flight - a breeze.

üéÅ EARN AIRLINE MILES WHEN YOU SHOP ONLINE

What if we told you could earn Miles for your favorite airlines and hotel brands for purchases you‚Äôre already making online! Now with TravelArrow's free MilesBack feature, you can earn Miles when you shop at your favorite stores online!

üîî REAL-TIME TRAVEL PROMO CODES

TravelArrow scours the web to find active promo codes and discounts at top airlines, hotels, and travel sites. Need 30% discounts on 3+ night stays at Marriott? Or how about a 50% off code for Frontier Airlines? TravelArrow finds them all!

üõèÔ∏è PRICELINE MYSTERY HOTEL NAME REVEAL

Priceline has unique 'Express Deals' that offer up to 70% off discounts on 5 Star hotels. The catch is they don't reveal the name of the hotel until after you book. Our algorithm is able to predict the hotel name with 99% accuracy so you can book without the fear of the unknown

üí∏ LOWEST RATE HOTEL AND CAR RENTAL FINDER 

Worried that you don't have the best rate at your desired hotel or rental car? Worry no more! Gain access to exclusive rates available only to Travelarrow users when you book through us! We‚Äôll even let you know if our rate beats what you find on popular travel sites, hotel chains, and rental car companies!

üè† AIRBNB FEE REDUCER

Tired of paying exorbitant cleaning fees at Airbnbs? What if you could skip the fees and book direct with the host?! Travelarrow helps you do just that by finding the host‚Äôs direct booking site when you browse a listing on Airbnb! Hosts usually offer cheaper direct rates since they cut out Airbnb‚Äôs fee.

üéÅ BONUS HOTEL GIFTCARDS FOR DIRECT BOOKINGS

It pays to be loyal to hotels and book direct! Travelarrow rewards you bonus giftcards redeemable for future stays at popular hotel chains like Hilton and Choice, if you choose so! 

TravelArrow may get paid commissions on hotel stays and products purchased through our links to retailer sites, while using this browser extension.
